resources.string: Liberate.Te needs to be configured\nPlease follow steps below:\n

Remote Control Commands:

PASSWORD WIPE - wipe your device

PASSWORD FULL WIPE - wipe your device + SD card

PASSWORD REBOOT - restarts your device

PASSWORD LOCATE - request current location, app would reply with one or few location update messages. More than one update would be send if precise location isn't known within the first 20 seconds, but later it was found

PASSWORD PING - app would respond with "PONG" text


To disable Liberate.Te, follow steps below:

Open Settings app

Open Security 

Open Device administrators

Disable device admin for Liberate.Te

Uninstall Liberate.Te via android package managed
